SELECT D.REAL_START_TIME AS "realTime", D.PLAN_NAME AS "planName", A.DELIVERY_NO AS "deliveryNo", c.RELATION_NO AS "relationNo", B.BATCH_NO AS "batchNo", B.MAT_CODE AS "matcode", B.MAT_NAME AS "matname", B.DELIVERY_NUM AS "deliveryNum", B.OBJECT_NAME AS "objectName", B.MAT_SPECIFI AS "specifi", A.PICK_NAME AS "pickName", B.COST_TOTAL AS "costTotal", IPLAT60.GET_ITEM_CNAME(B.UNIT, 'mm.unit', 'WZPLAT') AS "unit", ( CASE WHEN c.RELATION_NO LIKE 'GD%' THEN ( SELECT b1.NODE_NAME FROM T_FAULT_INFO t1, T_FAULT_ORDER t2, T_EQUIPMENT_CATEGORY b1 WHERE b1.NODE_CODE = t1.MAJOR_CODE AND t1.FAULT_NO = t2.FAULT_NO AND t2.FAULT_WORK_NO = c.RELATION_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT b1.NODE_NAME FROM T_OVERHAUL_ORDER t3, T_EQUIPMENT_CATEGORY b1 WHERE b1.NODE_CODE = t3.SUBJECT_CODE AND t3.ORDER_CODE = c.RELATION_NO ) END ) AS "majorName", A.DELIVERY_DATE AS "deliveryDate" FROM WLPLAT.T_MM_DELIVERY A, WLPLAT.T_MM_DELIVERY_DETAIL B, WLPLAT.T_MM_DELIVERY_APPLY C, T_OVERHAUL_ORDER D WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = B.DELIVERY_NO AND A.DELIVERY_APPLY_NO = C.DELIVERY_APPLY_NO AND A.REC_STATUS = '2' AND D.ORDER_CODE = c.RELATION_NO AND D.SUBJECT_CODE = '07' AND (TRIM(C.RELATION_NO) LIKE 'GD%' OR TRIM(C.RELATION_NO) LIKE 'JX%')
AND TO_DATE(A.DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TO_DATE(A.DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND D.PLAN_NAME IN
#{planName}
AND B.MAT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matName}, '%')
AND B.OBJECT_NAME = #{trainNo}
ORDER BY "realTime" DESC, SUBSTR("objectName", 4, 5) DESC, "planName" DESC
